data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Sagar, Madhya Pradesh, India that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sagar, Madhya Pradesh, India

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Sagar who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Sagar.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Sagar, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Sagar.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the county of Sagar hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.section_summary:
the county of Sagar, Madhya Pradesh, India has a population of 2,378,500.

We estimate Sagar has 26,164 people who might know Jesus, 28,859 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,323,477 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the county of Sagar against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.
